name: Format\ArticleTitle
description: The component for displaying an article title in the ArticleLink component.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: Ignored for all children of ArticleLink.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component..

properties.name: behavior
properties.description: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of text properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The formatting or markup method applied to the text.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for this component. If used, the identifier must be unique across the entire document. An identifier is required if you want to anchor other components to this component. See Anchor.

properties.name: inlineTextStyles
properties.description: An array of InlineTextStyle objects you can use to apply different text styles to ranges of text. For each InlineTextStyle object, supply rangeStart and rangeLength values, and either a TextStyle object or the identifier of a text style that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: Either an inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: style
properties.description: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text, styled according to the textStyle definition. You can also use a subset of HTML syntax by setting format to html. See Using HTML with Apple News Format.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
